A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The worst Star Wars film ever created.  Kylo Ren's childish temper tantrums and abysmal acting haven't changed since The Force Awakens.  Snoke in Hugh Heffner's robes seems like Disney's attempt at making Jar Jar " work". Sad contemporary humor stinks of millennial pandering.  Mary Sue Rey still cannot act and we're still supposed to care about her mysterious past. Oh and she's basically Wonder Woman after meditating briefly with Luke and swinging a lightsaber around by herself.  Fin and Rose story is contrived\, outlandish and frankly boring. Weird penguin creatures make no sense at all.  Ice foxes make even less sense but are used as a dull plot device.  The following scenes made me consider walking out:
Leia flying through space.
Luke milking lizard cows.
Island lizard people custodians.
Rey dueling Luke.
Derfy spectral Yoda regurgitating lines from Empire.

None of the characters felt like real people and the premise of a space car chase time constraint felt underwhelming. 
I pray that soon my memory of this abomination goes the way of Luke and suddenly becomes one with the force.
